backend/main.mo: Defines actor with storage mixin, user profiles, tasks, audit history types, and comparison helpers for sorting tasks and history entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking login‑related requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, their roles, and recent behavior changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining OKLCH color palettes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and including build trigger metadata.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Timestamped rebuild trigger file with current build version.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router handling authentication, profile loading, manager token validation, and error states.
frontend/src/components/AccountResetDial: Dialog allowing users to permanently delete their account with backend flush and session cleanup.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime failures and displays a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/AssistantDetailV: Empty placeholder file containing no content.
frontend/src/components/AssistantList.ts: Empty placeholder file containing no content.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapErr: Displays an error screen for profile-loading failures with retry and sign-out options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, registrations, and related backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light, dark, and system themes with localStorage persistence and automatic system updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark dental-themed color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by mounting React, providing query and identity providers, and loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Renders the assistant dashboard UI with profile details, task overview, overtime info, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles login flow with role selection, manager token gating, and error state management using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Displays manager‑specific dashboard cards and handles logout while clearing manager gate state and cache.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Provides profile creation for assistants and managers, validating inputs and submitting registrations based on stored role.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleDashboard.tsx: Shows a simple post‑registration dashboard displaying profile details and supports logout.
frontend/src/utils/managerTokenGate.ts: Manages manager token validation state, gate messages, and token storage in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash‑based query values.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Maps various backend and AuthClient error messages to short, user-friendly strings with a fallback for unknown errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, shadows, and enabling additional plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing known issues, existing features, and metadata for fixing sign-in feedback behavior.
